Dear team in Bcc,

 

Kindly ensure that you completed the Code of Ethics and that you downloaded the certificate. If you received this email then it seems it is not done as of July 17th 2025, this is needed every year.

 

Dear Marina,

 

Please share the updated list by August First week.

From: Florence Bulte <Florence.Bulte@chalhoub.com> 
Sent: Thursday, July 17, 2025 5:16 PM
To: Nasser Alblooshi <Nasser.Alblooshi@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Samer Touma <Samer.Touma@chalhoub.com>; Sabitha Menon <Sabitha.Menon@chalhoub.com>; Marine Roux <Marine.Roux@chalhoub.com>
Subject: Code of Ethics training - Completion follow-up - Country Management UAE

 

Dear All,

 

I hope you are well.

 

As you know, we launched the Code of Ethics training on April 29th, and our goal is to achieve a 95% completion rate by October 1st. For this reason, we would really appreciate your support in encouraging the remaining members of your team to complete the training. 

The training can be accessed through the following link: https://chalhoubuniversity.com/course/view.php?id=3453&stoploop=0

 

Please find below the current Code of Ethics training completion rate:

 

 



 

 

Please find enclosed the updated file of the team members who have not completed the training. 

 

Thank you in advance,

 

Kind regards,

 

FLORENCE BULTE
